alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 7:39AM MST until January 19 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of North and North Central Idaho and East Central and Southeast Washington. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
